item.title: 改变黑客攻击后，联合健康向医生和医院发送了 20 亿美元的资金
item.description: 联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：UnitedHealth Group Inc. said it advanced more than $2 billion to medical providers after a cyberattack on the company’s Change Healthcare subsidiary last month halted billions of dollars in medical payments.】

item.title: 世界银行将向埃及提供超过 60 亿美元的支持
item.description: 世界银行周一表示，计划在未来三年内向埃及提供超过 60 亿美元的支持，这是世界银行为支撑这个北非国家的经济所做的最新努力。【原文：The World Bank said Monday it plans on providing more than $6 billion in support to Egypt over the coming three years, marking the latest effort to shore up the North African nation’s economy.】

item.title: 奈拉前景光明，采取措施稳定汇率
item.description: 尼日利亚为稳定本国货币而进行的长期斗争终于取得了成果，分析师们现在预测，饱受打击的奈拉可能会在今年年底前大幅反弹。【原文：Nigeria’s prolonged battle to stabilize its currency is finally bearing fruit, with analysts now forecasting the battered naira could rebound sharply before the end of the year.】

item.title: 卢拉在刺激巴西经济增长、提高支持率的努力中激怒了投资者
item.description: 在巴西的总统府内，由于经济发展停滞不前，月复一月地公布着不温不火的增长数据，人们的焦虑与日俱增。总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦正在向他的高级助手们施加更大的压力，要求他们增加开支，加快经济增长，扭转支持率不断下滑的局面。【原文：Inside Brazil’s presidential palace, angst is mounting as the economy sputters along, churning out tepid growth figures month after month. President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva is ratcheting up the pressure on his top aides to boost spending, gin up faster growth and turn around his sinking approval ratings.】

item.title: 监控：人工智能遮蔽了太阳：英伟达首席执行官让鲍威尔黯然失色
item.description:
eToro的莱德勒表示，本周吸引眼球的是芯片制造商，而非美联储

。【原文：

It’s the chipmaker, not the Fed, grabbing attention this week, eToro’s Laidler says

】

item.title: 通用电气 870 亿美元股价暴利威胁分拆收益
item.description: 通用电气公司（General Electric Co.）的股价已飙升至六年多来的新高，价值增加了约 870 亿美元，因为投资者押注该公司的第二次也是最后一次分拆将为投资者带来福音。但是，进一步的上涨可能很难找到。【原文：General Electric Co. shares have powered to a more than six-year high, adding some $87 billion in value on bets that the company’s second and final spinoff will deliver a boon for investors. But, further gains may be tough to find.】

item.title: 雷蒙德-詹姆斯认为信用问题依然存在，将 NYCB 的评级下调至 "卖出"。
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）的资本注入和信用评级上调并不足以让雷蒙德-詹姆斯（Raymond James）相信，这家陷入困境的贷款机构将很快摆脱困境。【原文：A capital infusion and credit rating hike at New York Community Bancorp were not enough to convince Raymond James that the embattled lender will get beyond its challenges any time soon.】

item.title: 华尔街银行发掘欧洲活跃的债券市场
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）和摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Morgan Stanley and JPMorgan Chase & Co. are piling into Europe’s bond market to raise money, the first Wall Street banks to do so this year as they take advantage of strong funding conditions.】

item.title: 冰岛财政部长要求禁止冰岛银行收购 TM 公司
item.description: 冰岛财政部长表示，她将努力阻止国有银行 Landsbankinn hf 收购一家保险公司，因为这与政府政策相悖。【原文：Iceland’s finance minister said she will try to prevent state-owned lender Landsbankinn hf’s purchase of an insurance company as it contradicts government policy.】

item.title: 霸菱起诉 Corinthia 和 Ian Fowler 私人信贷叛逃案
item.description: 投资管理公司霸菱（Barings）起诉了科林西亚全球管理公司（Corinthia Global Management）以及前员工伊恩-福勒（Ian Fowler）和凯尔西-塔克（Kelsey Tucker），因为这家新成立的私人信贷公司在另类资产管理公司近年来最大规模的团队重组中挖走了 20 多名员工。【原文：Investment manager Barings sued Corinthia Global Management and former employees Ian Fowler and Kelsey Tucker after the upstart private credit firm poached more than 20 employees in one of the largest team lifts at an alternative asset manager in recent years.】

item.title: 高盛因移民问题上调美国 2024 年 GDP 增长和就业预测
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has raised its projections for US economic and jobs growth for this year to account for a faster pace of immigration.】

item.title: 普京在克里米亚吞并一周年之际庆祝大选获胜
item.description: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）在克里姆林宫严密控制的总统选举中取得创纪录的胜利，一天后，俄罗斯正在纪念他吞并克里米亚十周年，克里米亚的吞并开启了乌克兰战争的序幕。【原文：A day after Vladimir Putin claimed a record victory in presidential elections tightly controlled by the Kremlin, Russia is marking the 10th anniversary of his annexation of Crimea that began the march to war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 美国国会考虑联邦禁令，药明康德美国销售额上升
item.description: 药明康德公司2023年65%的销售额来自美国，而这一收入正受到美国政治努力切断与中国生物技术公司关系的威胁。【原文：WuXi AppTec Co. generated 65% of its 2023 sales from the US, revenue that’s under threat by American political efforts to cut ties with Chinese biotechnology companies.】

item.title: 代理公司 Glass Lewis 在激进主义斗争中支持迪士尼管理层
item.description: 有影响力的股东咨询公司 Glass Lewis & Co.建议华特迪士尼公司的投资者支持媒体公司管理层与激进分子的斗争。【原文：Glass Lewis & Co., the influential shareholder advisory firm, has recommended that investors in Walt Disney Co. back the media company’s management in its battle with activists.】

item.title: 法国重新评估英国电力线路，供电安全问题迫在眉睫
item.description: 法国能源监管机构表示，与英国建立第四条电力连接线将有助于保障供应安全，而此前由于英国脱欧带来的不确定性，该机构拒绝了这一提议。【原文：France’s energy regulator said a fourth power link to the UK would help safeguard security of supply, after previously rejecting the proposal because of the uncertainties created by Brexit.】

item.title: 伦敦市长在竞选活动中承诺新建 4 万套议会住宅
item.description: 伦敦市长萨迪克-汗（Sadiq Khan）周一启动了竞选连任的活动，以争取第三个任期，他承诺在本十年结束前新建 4 万套议会住宅，作为解决该市住房短缺问题的努力的一部分。【原文：London Mayor Sadiq Khan, who launched his re-election campaign for a third term on Monday, pledged to build 40,000 new council homes by the end of the decade as part of efforts to address a housing shortage in the city.】

item.title: 大英百科全书》寻求 10 亿美元的首次公开募股估值
item.description: 据知情人士透露，大英百科全书公司（Encyclopaedia Britannica Inc.【原文：Encyclopaedia Britannica Inc., the education technology company and publisher of books including the Merriam-Webster dictionary, is seeking a valuation of about $1 billion its initial public offering, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 伊拉克称将削减石油出口以弥补产量缺口
item.description: 伊拉克表示，未来几个月将减少石油出口，以弥补今年早些时候产量超过欧佩克+限额的损失。【原文：Iraq said it will reduce oil exports in the coming months to compensate for producing above its OPEC+ limits earlier this year.】

item.title: 恒大许家印因虚报业绩被禁止进入中国市场
item.description: 中国证券监管机构对中国恒大集团前董事长兼创始人许家印的欺诈行为处以 4700 万元（650 万美元）的罚款。【原文：China’s securities regulator imposed a fine of 47 million yuan ($6.5 million) on China Evergrande Group’s former chairman and founder, Hui Ka Yan, after he was caught out in fraudulent behavior.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会起诉虚假人工智能声明的基金经理
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）处罚了两家基金管理公司，称其使用人工智能的说法是虚假的，从而加大了华尔街主要监管机构的打击力度。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission penalized two money managers for what it says were bogus claims about their use of artificial intelligence, stepping up a crackdown by Wall Street’s main regulator.】

item.title: 大石油公司确定了 CERAWeek 开幕日的议程
item.description:
今年的主题是能源转型，但第一天的重点将是化石燃料的主要生产国。【原文：

The theme this year is the energy transition, but the firm focus on day one will be the top producers of fossil fuels.

】

item.title: 能源成本反弹，加拿大工厂价格上涨 0.7
item.description: 在能源和石油的推动下，工业产品价格五个月来首次上涨。【原文：Prices of industrial products rose for the first time in five months, driven by energy and petroleum.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油挤压加剧，苏维埃航运公司承认困难重重
item.description: 俄罗斯国营油轮公司 PJSC Sovcomflot 表示，美国制裁给其运营带来了压力，这是美国制裁措施使俄罗斯石油运输复杂化的最新迹象。【原文：Russia’s state oil tanker company PJSC Sovcomflot said that US sanctions are putting pressure on its operations, the latest sign that the measures are complicating the delivery of the nation’s petroleum.】

item.title: 法航在巴黎夏季奥运会前增加飞往美国的航班
item.description: 今年夏天，法国航空公司将增加长途航班，以应对巴黎奥运会前日益增长的需求，尤其是来自美国的需求。【原文：Air France is adding long-haul flights this summer in response to growing demand, especially from the US, ahead of the Olympic Games in Paris.】

item.title: 壳牌计划剥离 1,000 个零售点转向电动汽车充电系统
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）计划在未来两年内每年剥离 500 个零售点，以满足日益增长的电动汽车充电器需求。【原文：Shell Plc plans to divest 500 retail sites annually over the next two years, responding to a growing demand for electric vehicle chargers.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行在投资银行业务方面瞄准主权财富基金
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）正在寻求扩大与主权财富基金和私募股权巨头的关系，同时扩大其在咨询和股权承销领域的业务范围。【原文：Barclays Plc is seeking to expand its relationships with sovereign wealth funds and private equity giants as it broadens its footprint in advisory and equity underwriting.】

item.title: 阿曼财富基金为物流公司首次公开募股征集标书
item.description: 阿曼投资管理局正计划对阿曼苏丹国的物流公司 Asyad 集团进行首次公开募股，因为这个海湾国家正在加紧实施资产剥离计划。【原文：The Oman Investment Authority is planning an initial public offering of Asyad Group, the sultanate’s logistics company, as the Gulf nation ramps up its divestment program.】

item.title: 纳斯达克交易所称盘前技术故障已解决
item.description: 纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc.【原文：Nasdaq Inc. said a technology glitch that disrupted premarket trading for almost three hours is now resolved.】

item.title: 肯尼亚股票回报率傲视全球，先令功不可没
item.description: 在不到三个月的时间里，肯尼亚的股票基准从谷底一跃成为全球表现最好的股票。【原文：In the space of less than three months, Kenya’s stock benchmark has swung from rock bottom to being the world’s best performer.】

item.title: 德国联邦金融管理局称，迟迟未涉足商业地产的银行可能面临最大痛苦
item.description: 2013年10月16日星期三，英国伦敦，德国金融业监管机构Bafin银行业监管主管雷蒙德-罗伊斯勒（Raimund Roeseler）在接受采访后合影。Roeseler说，Bafin尚未结束对银行涉嫌操纵银行间拆借利率的调查。摄影师：西蒙-道森【原文：Raimund Roeseler, head of banking supervision at Bafin, Germany's finance industry regulator, poses for a photograph following an interview in London, U.K., on Wednesday, Oct. 16, 2013. Roeseler said Bafin has yet to conclude its probe into banks' alleged rigging of interbank borrowing rates. Photographer: Simon Dawson】
